title: Schoolgirl Abduction Is Latest In Nigeria's Sad Lineage Of Kidnappings
teaser: Mausi Segun, the Nigeria researcher for Human Rights Watch, lends her perspective on the abduction of nearly 300 Nigerian girls. Segun tracks such abductions, and she says that sadly they aren't rare.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
